title: How to manage eBooks on the Kindle - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the Kindle model (Here are my two devices): On the Kindle Keyboard, you can create folders with a subject name & move books to the folder. You can also add 3rd party books to your Kindle by connecting to your PC and copying them to the Kindle. On the Kindle Fire HD, you cannot do this as all books are in one large display system. However, you can create a directory and place 3rd party books into it. To create the directory & move books to it, just connect the Kindle HD to your PC & go. ... Then with a 3rd party explorer (AnTek, for example), you can access the books to read them. Many Public Domain Books can be found at Project Gutenberg.
